DESCRIPTION: Seeds are unplayable curse cards that will grow if cared for.
Bombs are unplayable status cards that damage you.
If the next attack this turn is fully blocked, the attacker takes the damage instead. If not, take double damage.
Attacks deal #b20% more damage, but you gain #b1 fewer [E] .
Yawns are Skill cards which grant #yBlock and #yExhaust.
Sleepwalks are unplayable Attack cards which deal damage when drawn.
Snoozed cards are shuffled back into your draw pile if they are not played.
Unplayable cards that are automatically put into effect at the start of battle. NL Cannot be upgraded.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
